

```{r}
library(MASS)
library(ISLR2)
rm(list=ls())
attach(Boston)
```

```{r}
lm.fit = lm(formula = medv ~ lstat + age, data = Boston)
summary(lm.fit)
```

```{r}
lm.fit <- lm(medv ~ ., data = Boston)
summary(lm.fit)
```

```{r}
library(car)
vif(lm.fit)
```

```{r}
lm.fit1 <- lm(medv ~ . - age, data = Boston)
summary(lm.fit1)
lm.fit1 <- update(lm.fit, ~ . - age)
```
